answers.answer: Yes after my 36 week appointment they made me an 37 week appointment. You might want to call and bring it up to them. You should be seen weekly from now on.
My OB doesn't see weekly until it goes after 40 weeks. So I did a 36 week appt, 38, and then 40. She also doesn't check dilation or anything like that.

I actually have my Dr's cell so I text him he said he purposely made it 2 weeks away because everything has been good this pregnancy. So I guess it's a good thing just makes me nervous to not be seen until I'm 38 weeks.
I feel a little better that someone else hasn't been seen weekly.

I was seen at 36 wont be seen till 38, its annoying coz i actually have questions this week but it seems to be the norm here. Btw iv had a hard pregnancy so expected to be watched regularly...but nope
Me too my doctor sees me after 2weeks at 35, 37,39 from there he hopes baby will be born he also does not do cervical examinations until when in actual labor

Sorry to hear you've had a hard pregnancy I would have assumed you'd be seen weekly for that reason. I haven't had a cervical exam either I didn't ask just thought it would be done at my 38 wk visit guess we'll see.

Im irish and they dont do cervical checks here untill ur in labour.Our system here seems totally diffrent to the us. For example i have pelvic girdle pain and gestational diabetes and have read that with gd they dont let u go over 38weeks but they havent said that to me just that its a waiting game

I have read that too about gd. I'm shocked they haven't discussed any options with u yet. I'm sure our drs know what there doing just wish they would explain in more detail so we don't have all these unanswered questions or search the Web and get even more confused.
I totally agree. I just wish someone would sit me down and say x,y and z is going to happen rather than leave me in the dark and to be honest kinda scared(of the unknown not of child birth)

question: I just had my 36 wk ob visit I was told I look good and my next appt is in 2 weeks. I thought at this point I would be seen weekly. Has anyone else not been seen weekly?
title: Confused 36 wk ob visit
